content: The Sister's Meal Festival is usually held in April by the Miao ethnic minority, in many different locations throughout Guizhou province. However, the biggest and most famous celebration takes place in Taijiang County, which is located in the southeast of Guizhou province. Taijiang County is the center of the Miao ethnic minority and is well known for its colorful Miao culture and customs. During this festival, you can experience the traditional way of life of the Miao people, including their unique costumes, food, and music. If you are interested in attending the Sister's Meal Festival, Taijiang County is definitely a great place to visit.
